April 2022 County of Marin EMS PM 2
PEDIATRIC ALLERGIC REACTION
Indications
• Exposure to allergens causing airway, breathing and/or circulatory impairment
ALS RMC
Mild Moderate/Severe
(hives, rash)
• Epinephrine (1mg/ml
• Benadryl 1mg/kg IM concentration) 0.01mg/kg IM
• Max dose: 50mg • MR x1 in 5 min
• Max total dose: 0.6mg
• Benadryl 1mg/kg IM/IV/IO
• Max dose: 50mg
• Albuterol 2.5mg in 3ml NS
HHN if bronchospasm present
• MR x1 if no improvement
If Hypotensive
• NS fluid bolus
• 3-5kg: 10ml/kg IV/IO
• ≥6kg: 20ml/kg IV/IO
• MR as needed
If unresponsive/no palpable
BP or pulse
• Go to Pediatric Cardiac Arrest
Policy, PC 1
